page.title: 11A Lothingland School Day
page.content: Most children in Lothingland Middle (10_13)travel to school by bus from Somerleyton,Corton,Blundeston and Oulton Broad. At 9.00 am our teachers call the register. Lessons start at 9.25. At 10.35 we have break,lunch at 12.00. Some children have packed lunch, some have school dinners. At 3.15 we have registration. At 3.25 we catch buses to go home. At Lound we have form teachers,year tutors,dept heads and a headmaster. We also have different subject teachers. Each class has roughly 30 pupils. Each class moves around 2 buildings for different lessons,such as Maths,English,French, Science,Integrated Work,Drama,P.E and Music. We all have to wear school uniform. The colours are blue, black, grey and white.
